LanguageData.fulfill_outdoors_label: Pawns are encouraged to fulfill their need of outdoors by seeking recreation outdoors
LanguageData.fulfill_outdoors_note: NOTE: Don't place the same joy giving sources both indoors and outdoors to avoid indecisiveness.
LanguageData.clean_before_working_label: Pawns are encouraged to clean the room before operating a building in it
LanguageData.clean_before_working_note: NOTE: don't expect cleaning from those guys, that don't like to clean
LanguageData.bill_job_pathing_label: Calculate accurate path to the building for bill jobs
LanguageData.bill_job_pathing_note: It'll help to avoid making unreasonable hooks around when your pawns need to bring resources first, but it may be costly on CPU
LanguageData.clean_after_tending_label: Pawns are encouraged clean the room after tending to a patient
LanguageData.clean_after_tending_note: NOTE: don't expect cleaning from those guys, that don't like to clean
LanguageData.meal_stacking_label: Pawns avoid mixing negative thoughts when stacking meals
LanguageData.meal_stacking_note: That way pawns will never mix disgusting meals with normal ones
LanguageData.dont_count_odd_label: Count odd meat (ex.: insect) as normal, allowing to stack it with normal meals
LanguageData.gen_ingredients_label: Add random ingredients to randomly generated meals
LanguageData.gen_ingredients_note: Ex.: gifted by story teller, sold by a trader, looted from corpse. Only mood neutral components are used. With this option on, the game will never be the same
LanguageData.add_to_que_note: That way pawns will not change their mind after performing an opportunistic task, but sometimes it can cause a confusion if a job was already taken
LanguageData.hauling_over_bills_label: Pawns are encouraged to haul ingredients for a bill to a stockpile
LanguageData.hauling_over_bills_note: When working on a bill, pawns will prefer hauling ingredients to a stockpile, instead of taking a small fraction, required for a recipe
LanguageData.drugs_use_potential_mood_label: Pawns are encouraged to take account of potential mood in drug policies
LanguageData.drugs_use_potential_mood_note: Pawns will not use drugs if "potential" mood is above a marker, prevents overuse of drugs to get above a set level of mood
LanguageData.extended_recipe_label: Recipes display complete list of ingredients
LanguageData.advanced_inbetween_cleaning_label: Pawns will clean rooms in between hauling ingredients and crafting
LanguageData.advanced_inbetween_cleaning_note: Basic behavior would let them clean only before hauling
